about.title: Key applications of {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) supports complete CRUD capabilities for document signature management. You can sign over 60 different formats, including PDFs, MS Office files, Images, and ZIP archives, using various signature types such as text, images, barcodes, digital certificates, metadata, and stamps. In addition to signing, it allows you to search for, validate, update, or remove signatures.

more_features.title: Advanced document signing
more_features.description: {{ProdShortName}} is a comprehensive solution designed to streamline document signing and authentication across widely used formats. It offers 7 signature types and full CRUD operations to ensure comprehensive protection and management of your document content.

feature_1.title: Streamline corporate document signing
feature_1.content: Seamlessly apply customized digital signatures to any section of your documents. With support for text, image, barcode, metadata, stamp, and digital certificate signatures, {{ProdFullName}} ensures your documents meet corporate standards.

feature_2.title: Full signature lifecycle management
feature_2.content: Easily manage the entire lifecycle of signatures within documents. Access, verify, update, or remove any signature as needed, ensuring your documents remain up-to-date and accurate.

feature_3.title: Document content integrity protection
feature_3.content: Secure your sensitive documents by embedding digital certificates that prevent unauthorized alterations. Additionally, add hidden metadata to safeguard critical information and enforce content integrity.

feature_4.title: Tailored native signatures
feature_4.content: Take advantage of document-specific signature types such as PDF stamps and Word watermarks. These tailored signatures are ideal for branding, watermarking, or compliance purposes, delivering a refined professional touch to your corporate documents.

formats.title: Cross-format signature verification
formats.description: {{ProdFullName}} enables you to efficiently verify signatures across a wide range of document formats. Set customizable verification parameters to ensure document integrity and compliance.

operations.title: Comprehensive operations and signature types
operations.description: Explore the extensive range of features and signature management operations available with {{ProdShortName}}, supporting full control over your document's signature processes.
